Plot:
Life On Mars is the smash-hit cop show starring John Simm as a detective who is involved in a car accident and wakes to find himself transported back to 1973 a world dominated by Ford Cortinas, sheep-skin jackets and very hard coppers.

(DVD-1)
Episode 1 Monday 9th January 2006,

Sam (John Simm) Tyler's world is about to be turned upside down. Moments after his girlfriend and colleague is kidnapped, Sam is knocked unconscious by a car and wakes up - in 1973.

Episode 2 Monday 16th January 2006,

Sam's dogged pursuit of evidence brings him head to head with his DCI, Gene Hunt (Philip Glenister) when the team arrests an elusive criminal high on the CID's wanted list.

Episode 3 Monday 23rd January 2006,

Sam starts to feel at home in 1973. But when thereÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s a fatal stabbing at Crester's Textiles, he's shocked to discover that Crester's is the converted Mill where he lives in 2006.

Episode 4 Monday 30th January 2006,

Sam calls into question the ethos of his whole department when he takes on a local gangster. But does Sam realise the full consequences of this fight? And can Gene lay to rest a ghost from his past?


**********************************************************************************
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(DVD-2)
Episode 5 Monday 6th February 2006,

Investigating the murder of a Manchester United football fan, Sam, Gene and WPC Annie Cartwright ( Liz White ) go undercover to gather evidence in the local pub - Gene's ideal job!

Episode 6 Monday 13th February 2006,

When his mother's voice bleeds through from 2006, Sam hears her say goodbye to him. His life support machine is to be turned off at 2pm. In 1973 a hostage-taker will kill his prisoners at 2pm. Is this Sam's way of saving his life in 2006?

Episode 7 Monday 20th February 2006,

When a small time drug dealer dies in police custody, Sam is pitted against the whole of CID. His suspicions of a police cover-up make him very unpopular. Even more so when he tries to find out the tru

Episode 8 Episode 8 Monday 27th February 2006,
